name: Human Factors International
description: Human Factors International is on the brink of a new post-digital era and it’s time to rethink digital success and how to achieve it. Digital transformation is no longer the biggest deal. A business can stay ahead only it is able to create influence among customers. This influence results from many things: responding appropriately to an increasingly complex system of consumers, changing expectations, and technology; investing in deeply understanding these consumers; and using these insights to create environments in which customers thrive. Human Factors International (HFI) helps you create such long-lasting relationships with your consumers across all touchpoints and leverage the influence that results from engaging digital experiences.
features: Providing flexibility to manage work-life balance

Headline: We empower businesses to influence the future with user experience.
ShortDescription: Human Factors International, leaders of experience-led business transformations. We’ve delivered smart, practical and insight-based solutions worth over $256,000,000 in CX work for Fortune 500 companies.

Highlights.name: Experts in Customer and User Experience Design
Highlights.description: According to the document, HFI is a company that specializes in Customer Experience (CX) and User Experience (UX) design [1]. This means that HFI has the expertise to help businesses design products and services that are user-friendly and meet the needs of their customers.

Highlights.name: Proven Track Record of Success
Highlights.description: The document says that HFI has a proven track record of success, with over $256 million in CX work delivered for Fortune 500 clients [1]. This means that HFI has a lot of experience helping businesses improve their CX and UX, and they have a good reputation for doing so.

Highlights.name: Services for All Stages of the CX/UX Journey
Highlights.description: HFI can help businesses at any stage of their CX/UX journey, from strategy and design to implementation and maintenance [1]. This means that HFI can provide businesses with the support they need to achieve their CX and UX goals.

enhanced_description: Human Factors International (HFI) is a recognized leader in experience-led business transformations, specializing in Customer Experience (CX) and User Experience (UX) design. Leveraging their expertise in human factors, HFI assists businesses in creating influence among customers by deeply understanding consumer behaviors, changing expectations, and technology. They develop and implement engaging digital experiences across all touchpoints, fostering long-lasting customer relationships and driving digital success. HFI offers comprehensive support across the entire CX/UX journey, from strategic planning and design to implementation and ongoing maintenance. With a proven track record, HFI has delivered over $256 million in CX work for Fortune 500 companies.
